lead_paragraph: NBC said its Olympic audience reached parity with the London Games for the first time on the third night of competition. But there's an asterisk involved in the claim.

headline.print_headline: NBC Says Rio Olympic Viewership Reaches Parity With London
headline.main: NBC Says Rio Olympic Viewership Reaches Parity With London

snippet: NBC said its Olympic audience reached parity with the London Games for the first time on the third night of competition. But there's an asterisk involved in the claim....
